Text:
The CBR version that's included appears to be  broken. CDisplay won't open it, and WinRar gives an error about it being of an unkown format or broken.  The Rar version, however, did work.
FYI
The CBR version works perfect in ComicRack 9.156.
These pages are completely out of order.
What pages are out of order?
I had the same problem with the .cbr version (using CDisplayEx) but I renamed the .rar version to .cbr and it worked. Sincere thanks for sharing SerialKilla12!
Thank you STFmaryville! Sharing more comic books soon even if previously released using my methods and images.
